Name: The Dictionary of Foreign Words
Description: This is a dictionary that contains widespread Estonian words of foreign origin. The resource is available for download from META-SHARE (CELR distribution) and for online browsing through a dedicated website.
Annotation: orthography, inflection, semantics and etymology of the words; for many unadapted foreign words the pronunciation is given, both audio and written; the understanding and use of the words is facilitated by labels and cross-references.
